titleStmt.title: The impartialest satyre that ever was seen that speaks truth without fear, or flattery, or spleen: read as you list, commend it, or come mend it, the man that pen'd it, did with finis end it.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Dyce Collection at the Victoria and Albert Museum.
